project.name: Google Cloud Pub/Sub Client Code Samples
project.description:
Code samples for the High performance Cloud Pub/Sub client library.
(ALPHA) This samples use features that are part of an invitation-only release of the underlying Cloud Pub/Sub API. The library will generate errors unless you have access to this API. This restriction should be relaxed in the near future. Please contact cloud-pubsub@google.com with any questions in the meantime.
